author: sanjiva
msg: Moved most of the core logic of rpcrouter.jsp into a regular class
called RPCRouter.java. Also restructured the code so that only real
code is in the org/apache/soap/server directory/package. Added a new
directory under the xml-soap/java directory called "webapps" which has
two subdirs - rpcrouter and admin. The first contains the JSP that
received HTTP requests and uses the org.apache.soap.server.RPCRouter
class to do the real work. The second is the SOAP admin tool which
can be used to deploy and manage services. More detailed posting will
be made to the soap-dev list.

author: sanjiva
msg: removed refs to BML namespace URI which was deleted because we never
finished the BML encoding before contributing the code to Apache.

author: sanjiva
msg: fixed to compile the samples correctly.
